metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to interacting with the rules poster in the Dorms. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_AGo to 1300; -2; -809interact with the parchment on the wall

0.speaker: Player
0.text: They run a tight ship. Must be a horrible place to grow up.
